thread.title: Asia's largest film festival opens in South Korea
thread.title_full: Asia's largest film festival opens in South Korea

title: Asia's largest film festival opens in South Korea
text:
> Entertainment Asia's largest film festival opens in South Korea Chinese actress Tang Wei waves as she arrives to attend the opening ceremony of the Busan International Film Festival at Busan Cinema Center in Busan, South Korea, Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015. (AP Photo/Ahn Young-joon) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
